user.title: Setup your tedee
user.description:
[How to create Personal Access Token](https://tedee-tedee-api-doc.readthedocs-hosted.com/en/latest/howtos/authenticate.html#personal-access-key)  

Scopes:  
- Operate - Lock  
- Devices - Read

reauth_confirm.title: Update of Personal Access Key required
reauth_confirm.description: tedee needs an updated Personal Access Key, because the existing one is invalid or might have expired.
